Pre-Game Insights: India have won six out of eight T20Is against Afghanistan
Afghanistan finished second in Group C standings to seal the Super 8 spot
India topped Group A standings in the league stage with three wins and one no result
Others: The pitch at the Kensington Oval in the T20 World Cup 2024 has provided assistance to the fast bowlers and spinners alike
The average first innings score of 154 at this venue in T20Is could prove to be quite a competitive total
The top performers for India in the tournament are the captain Rohit Sharma, Rishabh Pant, Suryakumar Yadav, Hardik Pandya, Arshdeep Singh, and Jasprit Bumrah
Virat Kohli, who has been one of the top scorers in T20 World Cups over the years, is yet to go out all guns blazing
